articles.content:

articles.title: Air NZ, Jetstar and Virgin Australia set same date for first Aussie flights into Queenstown - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Three airlines have flights scheduled from Australia to Queenstown on March 28, but one expert says travellers should hold off booking.
articles.content:
Three airlines seem to have thrown a dart at March 28 as the date to start selling trans-Tasman bubble fares.
